article_title: Ex-worker accused of embezzling supplies, equipment from W.Va. highways agency
article_text:

og.description: MARTINSBURG, W.Va. — A former West Virginia Division of Highways worker accused of stealing thousands of dollars in equipment and supplies from the state agency was indicted Friday on embezzlement and fraud charges by a Berkeley County grand jury.
